channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JSG45EKC6A4GPYQ9X7SY004Y
item.description: ​As of April 2025, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Los Angeles Clippers have never faced each other in the NBA playoffs. Despite sharing the same city and, until recently, the same arena, their postseason paths have never intersected. The Clippers have made 19 playoff appearances in their 55-season history , while the Lakers have qualified for the playoffs 65 times in 77 seasons . However, they have never met in a playoff series.
item.content:encoded: ​As of April 2025, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Los Angeles Clippers have never faced each other in the NBA playoffs. Despite sharing the same city and, until recently, the same arena, their postseason paths have never intersected. The Clippers have made 19 playoff appearances in their 55-season history , while the Lakers have qualified for the playoffs 65 times in 77 seasons . However, they have never met in a playoff series.

item.title: Papra - Document Archiving Tool
item.description:
Papra - Document Archiving Tool

Papra is a minimalistic document management and archiving platform. It is designed to be simple to use and accessible to everyone. Papra is a platform for long-term document storage and management, like a digital archive for your documents.
Paperless NGX alternative. Hopefully it stays true to its simpler approach.
item.content:encoded:
Papra - Document Archiving Tool

Papra is a minimalistic document management and archiving platform. It is designed to be simple to use and accessible to everyone. Papra is a platform for long-term document storage and management, like a digital archive for your documents.
Paperless NGX alternative. Hopefully it stays true to its simpler approach.

item.title: Get Started with Python for Excel (Native Microsoft Feature in Microsoft Excel) - Beginner Course
item.description:
Get Started with Python for Excel (Native Microsoft Feature in Microsoft Excel) - Beginner Course

Welcome to Learn Python for Excel! In this first module, we’re getting you set up and ready to dive into one of the most exciting advancements in data work: integrating Python directly into Excel. Whether you’re a seasoned spreadsheet user or just curious about code, you’re in the right place.
item.content:encoded:
Get Started with Python for Excel (Native Microsoft Feature in Microsoft Excel) - Beginner Course

Welcome to Learn Python for Excel! In this first module, we’re getting you set up and ready to dive into one of the most exciting advancements in data work: integrating Python directly into Excel. Whether you’re a seasoned spreadsheet user or just curious about code, you’re in the right place.

item.title: ExpenseOwl
item.description:
ExpenseOwl

Extremely simple, self-hosted expense tracker with a beautiful UI.
Just another one of those expense tracking app.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Tailscale Healthcheck
item.description:
Tailscale Healthcheck

A Python-based Flask application to monitor the health of devices in a Tailscale network. The application provides endpoints to check the health status of all devices, specific devices, and lists of healthy or unhealthy devices
item.content:encoded:
Tailscale Healthcheck

A Python-based Flask application to monitor the health of devices in a Tailscale network. The application provides endpoints to check the health status of all devices, specific devices, and lists of healthy or unhealthy devices

item.title: Austen - story relationships between book characters
item.description:
Austen - story relationships between book characters

Austen is an AI-powered Angular application initialized with Analogjs to generate story relationships between book characters using Mermaidjs diagrams.
item.content:encoded:
Austen - story relationships between book characters

Austen is an AI-powered Angular application initialized with Analogjs to generate story relationships between book characters using Mermaidjs diagrams.

item.title: Migrating from WordPress to Hugo
item.description:
Migrating from WordPress to Hugo

Discover why moving away from WordPress to a static site boosts security and reduces costs. Learn about the seamless migration process and optimized deployment.
Hopefully this will work when I need it to be.
item.content:encoded:
Migrating from WordPress to Hugo

item.title: If your Jellyfin is having high memory usage, add MALLOC_TRIM_THRESHOLD_=100000 to environment
item.description:
If your Jellyfin is having high memory usage, add MALLOC_TRIM_THRESHOLD_=100000 to environment

Many users reported high memory/RAM usage, some 8GB+. In my case gone from 1.5GB+ to 400MB or less on Raspberry Pi 4. Adding MALLOC_TRIM_THRESHOLD_=100000 can make a big difference.
Jellyfin was indeed one of those Docker apps I don’t understand why they’re using so much RAM even on idle.
item.content:encoded:
If your Jellyfin is having high memory usage, add MALLOC_TRIM_THRESHOLD_=100000 to environment

Many users reported high memory/RAM usage, some 8GB+. In my case gone from 1.5GB+ to 400MB or less on Raspberry Pi 4. Adding MALLOC_TRIM_THRESHOLD_=100000 can make a big difference.
Jellyfin was indeed one of those Docker apps I don’t understand why they’re using so much RAM even on idle.
